properties.name: id
properties.description: Auto generated unique id

properties.name: createdAt
properties.description: Profile creation date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

properties.name: updatedAt
properties.description: Profile last update date as Unix timestamp (In seconds)

properties.name: autoCreateFlavors
properties.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that should be auto converted

properties.name: autoCreateThumb
properties.description: Comma separated thumbnail params ids that should be auto generated

properties.name: optionalFlavorParamsIds
properties.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that should be submitted if ready

properties.name: requiredFlavorParamsIds
properties.description: Comma separated flavor params ids that required to be ready before submission

properties.name: optionalThumbDimensions
properties.description: Thumbnail dimensions that should be submitted if ready

properties.name: requiredThumbDimensions
properties.description: Thumbnail dimensions that required to be readt before submission

properties.name: optionalAssetDistributionRules
properties.description: Asset Distribution Rules for assets that should be submitted if ready

properties.name: validationError
properties.description: The validation error description that will be set on the "data" property on KalturaDistributionValidationErrorMissingAsset if rule was not fulfilled

properties.name: assetDistributionConditions
properties.description: An array of asset distribution conditions

arrayType.description: Abstract class for asset distribution condition

properties.name: requiredAssetDistributionRules
properties.description: Assets Asset Distribution Rules for assets that are required to be ready before submission

properties.name: sunriseDefaultOffset
properties.description: If entry distribution sunrise not specified that will be the default since entry creation time, in seconds

properties.name: sunsetDefaultOffset
properties.description: If entry distribution sunset not specified that will be the default since entry creation time, in seconds

properties.name: recommendedStorageProfileForDownload
properties.description: The best external storage to be used to download the asset files from

properties.name: recommendedDcForDownload
properties.description: The best Kaltura data center to be used to download the asset files to

properties.name: recommendedDcForExecute
properties.description: The best Kaltura data center to be used to execute the distribution job

properties.name: fieldName
properties.description:
A value taken from a connector field enum which associates the current configuration to that connector field
     Field enum class should be returned by the provider's getFieldEnumClass function.

properties.name: userFriendlyFieldName
properties.description: A string that will be shown to the user as the field name in error messages related to the current field

properties.name: entryMrssXslt
properties.description:
An XSLT string that extracts the right value from the Kaltura entry MRSS XML.
     The value of the current connector field will be the one that is returned from transforming the Kaltura entry MRSS XML using this XSLT string.

properties.name: isRequired
properties.description: Is the field required to have a value for submission ?

properties.name: updateOnChange
properties.description: Trigger distribution update when this field changes or not ?

properties.name: updateParams
properties.description: Entry column or metadata xpath that should trigger an update

arrayType.description: A string representation to return an array of strings

properties.name: isDefault
properties.description: Is this field config is the default for the distribution provider?

properties.name: triggerDeleteOnError
properties.description: Is an error on this field going to trigger deletion of distributed content?

properties.name: xpath
properties.description: XPath for the extending item

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: Object identifier

properties.name: extendedFeatures
properties.description: Comma separated string of enum values denoting which features of the item need to be included in the MRSS

properties.name: extensionMode
properties.description: Mode of extension - append to MRSS or replace the xpath content.

properties.name: useCategoryEntries
properties.description: When checking custom XSLT conditions using the fieldConfigArray - address only categories associated with the entry via the categoryEntry object
